remarks: The components of the identity matrix (as operation in maps-to notation).  (Contributed by AV, 22-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mamumat1cl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mamumat1cl.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mamumat1cl.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
mamumat1cl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
mamumat1cl.i $e |- I = ( i e. M , j e. M |-> if ( i = j , .1. , .0. ) ) $.
mamumat1cl.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. Fin ) $.
mat1comp $p |- ( ( A e. M /\ J e. M ) -> ( A I J ) = if ( A = J , .1. , .0. ) ) $.
